DOC.brief_summary: Determine the ability of real-time ultrasound with fusion technology of prior acquired MRI of the pelvis to guide a needle to the second sacral foramen using the posterior approach and place a interstim lead.
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Image Fusion for Placement of Sacral Quadripolar Leads
DOC.criteria: Patient consented for Interstim lead placement Patients requesting not to be in the study. Pregnant patients
